                            # 03ã€æŠŠ log4j.properties è½¬æˆ logback-test.xml

                            å¦‚æœä½ çš„é¡¹ç›®ä»¥å‰ç”¨çš„ Log4jï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆå¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡ä¸‹é¢è¿™ä¸ªç½‘å€æŠŠ log4j.properties è½¬æˆ logback-test.xmlï¼š

                            http://logback.qos.ch/translator/open in new window

                            æŠŠä¹‹å‰ log4j.properties çš„å†…å®¹æ‹·è´ä¸€ä»½ï¼š

                            ### è®¾ç½®###
log4j.rootLogger = debug,stdout,D,E

### è¾“å‡ºä¿¡æ¯åˆ°æ§åˆ¶å° ###
log4j.appender.stdout = org.apache.log4j.ConsoleAppender
log4j.appender.stdout.Target = System.out
log4j.appender.stdout.layout = org.apache.log4j.PatternLayout
log4j.appender.stdout.layout.ConversionPattern = [%-5p] %d{yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss,SSS} method:%l%n%m%n

### è¾“å‡ºDEBUG çº§åˆ«ä»¥ä¸Šçš„æ—¥å¿—åˆ°=debug.log ###
log4j.appender.D = org.apache.log4j.DailyRollingFileAppender
log4j.appender.D.File = debug.log
log4j.appender.D.Append = true
log4j.appender.D.Threshold = DEBUG 
log4j.appender.D.layout = org.apache.log4j.PatternLayout
log4j.appender.D.layout.ConversionPattern = %d{yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss}  [ %t:%r ] - [ %p ]  %m%n

### è¾“å‡ºERROR çº§åˆ«ä»¥ä¸Šçš„æ—¥å¿—åˆ°=error.log ###
log4j.appender.E = org.apache.log4j.DailyRollingFileAppender
log4j.appender.E.File =error.log 
log4j.appender.E.Append = true
log4j.appender.E.Threshold = ERROR 
log4j.appender.E.layout = org.apache.log4j.PatternLayout
log4j.appender.E.layout.ConversionPattern = %d{yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss}  [ %t:%r ] - [ %p ]  %m%n

                            ç²˜è´´åˆ°è¯¥ç½‘å€çš„æ–‡æœ¬åŸŸï¼š

                            ç‚¹å‡»ã€ŒTranslateã€ï¼Œå¯ä»¥å¾—åˆ°ä»¥ä¸‹å†…å®¹ï¼š

                            <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

<!-- For assistance related to logback-translator or configuration  -->
<!-- files in general, please contact the logback user mailing list -->
<!-- at http://www.qos.ch/mailman/listinfo/logback-user             -->
<!--                                                                -->
<!-- For professional support please see                            -->
<!--    http://www.qos.ch/shop/products/professionalSupport         -->
<!--                                                                -->
<configuration>
  <appender name="stdout" class="ch.qos.logback.core.ConsoleAppender">
    <Target>System.out</Target>
    <encoder>
      <pattern>[%-5p] %d{yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss,SSS} method:%l%n%m%n</pattern>
    </encoder>
  </appender>
  <appender name="D" class="ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender">
    <!--See http://logback.qos.ch/manual/appenders.html#RollingFileAppender-->
    <!--and http://logback.qos.ch/manual/appenders.html#TimeBasedRollingPolicy-->
    <!--for further documentation-->
    <Append>true</Append>
    <File>debug.log</File>
    <encoder>
      <pattern>%d{yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss} [ %t:%r ] - [ %p ] %m%n</pattern>
    </encoder>
    <filter class="ch.qos.logback.classic.filter.ThresholdFilter">
      <level>DEBUG</level>
    </filter>
  </appender>
  <appender name="E" class="ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender">
    <!--See http://logback.qos.ch/manual/appenders.html#RollingFileAppender-->
    <!--and http://logback.qos.ch/manual/appenders.html#TimeBasedRollingPolicy-->
    <!--for further documentation-->
    <File>error.log</File>
    <Append>true</Append>
    <encoder>
      <pattern>%d{yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss} [ %t:%r ] - [ %p ] %m%n</pattern>
    </encoder>
    <filter class="ch.qos.logback.classic.filter.ThresholdFilter">
      <level>ERROR</level>
    </filter>
  </appender>
  <root level="debug">
    <appender-ref ref="stdout"/>
    <appender-ref ref="D"/>
    <appender-ref ref="E"/>
  </root>
</configuration>

                            å¯ä»¥ç¡®è®¤ä¸€ä¸‹å†…å®¹ï¼Œå‘ç°ä¸‰ä¸ª appender éƒ½åœ¨ã€‚

                            ä½†æ˜¯å‘¢ï¼Œè½¬æ¢åçš„æ–‡ä»¶å¹¶ä¸èƒ½ç›´æ¥ä½¿ç”¨ï¼Œéœ€è¦ç¨å¾®åšä¸€äº›è°ƒæ•´ï¼Œå› ä¸ºï¼š

                            ç¬¬ä¸€ï¼Œæ—¥å¿—çš„æ ¼å¼åŒ–æœ‰ç»†å¾®çš„ä¸åŒï¼ŒLogback ä¸­æ²¡æœ‰ %lã€‚

                            TimeBasedRollingPolicy å’Œ SizeAndTimeBasedRollingPolicy æ˜¯ä¸¤ç§æœ€å¸¸ç”¨çš„æ»šåŠ¨ç­–ç•¥ã€‚

                            TimeBasedRollingPolicy åŒæ—¶å®ç°äº† RollingPolicy ä¸ TriggeringPolicy æ¥å£ï¼Œå› æ­¤ä½¿ç”¨ TimeBasedRollingPolicy çš„æ—¶å€™å°±å¯ä»¥ä¸æŒ‡å®š TriggeringPolicyã€‚

                            TimeBasedRollingPolicy å¯ä»¥æŒ‡å®šä»¥ä¸‹å±æ€§ï¼š

                            • fileNamePatternï¼Œç”¨æ¥å®šä¹‰æ–‡ä»¶çš„åå­—ï¼ˆå¿…é€‰é¡¹ï¼‰ã€‚å®ƒçš„å€¼åº”è¯¥ç”±æ–‡ä»¶ååŠ ä¸Šä¸€ä¸ª %d çš„å ä½ç¬¦ã€‚%d åº”è¯¥åŒ…å« java.text.SimpleDateFormat ä¸­è§„å®šçš„æ—¥æœŸæ ¼å¼ï¼Œç¼ºçœæ˜¯ yyyy-MM-ddã€‚æ»šåŠ¨å‘¨æœŸæ˜¯é€šè¿‡ fileNamePattern æ¨æ–­å‡ºæ¥çš„ã€‚

                            • maxHistoryï¼Œæœ€å¤šä¿ç•™å¤šå°‘æ•°é‡çš„æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶ï¼ˆå¯é€‰é¡¹ï¼‰ï¼Œå°†ä¼šé€šè¿‡å¼‚æ­¥çš„æ–¹å¼åˆ é™¤æ—§çš„æ–‡ä»¶ã€‚æ¯”å¦‚ï¼Œä½ æŒ‡å®šæŒ‰æœˆæ»šåŠ¨ï¼ŒæŒ‡å®š maxHistory = 6ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆ 6 ä¸ªæœˆå†…çš„æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶å°†ä¼šä¿ç•™ï¼Œè¶…è¿‡ 6 ä¸ªæœˆçš„å°†ä¼šè¢«åˆ é™¤ã€‚

                            • totalSizeCapï¼Œæ‰€æœ‰æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶çš„å¤§å°ï¼ˆå¯é€‰é¡¹ï¼‰ã€‚è¶…å‡ºè¿™ä¸ªå¤§å°æ—¶ï¼Œæ—§çš„æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶å°†ä¼šè¢«å¼‚æ­¥åˆ é™¤ã€‚éœ€è¦é…åˆ maxHistory å±æ€§ä¸€èµ·ä½¿ç”¨ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”æ˜¯ç¬¬äºŒæ¡ä»¶ã€‚

                            æ¥çœ‹ä¸‹é¢è¿™ä¸ª RollingFileAppender é…ç½®ï¼š

                            <appender name="D" class="ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender">
    <file>debug.log</file>
    <rollingPolicy class="ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.TimeBasedRollingPolicy">
        <!--            æŒ‰å¤©æ»šåŠ¨ -->
        <fileNamePattern>debug.%d{yyyy-MM-dd}.log</fileNamePattern>
        <!--            ä¿å­˜ 30 å¤©çš„å†å²è®°å½•ï¼Œæœ€å¤§å¤§å°ä¸º 30GB -->
        <maxHistory>30</maxHistory>
        <totalSizeCap>3GB</totalSizeCap>
    </rollingPolicy>
    <encoder>
        <pattern>%relative [%thread] %level %logger{35} - %msg%n</pattern>
    </encoder>
</appender>

                            åŸºäºæŒ‰å¤©æ»šåŠ¨çš„æ–‡ä»¶ç­–ç•¥ï¼Œæœ€å¤šä¿ç•™ 30 å¤©ï¼Œæœ€å¤§å¤§å°ä¸º 30Gã€‚

                            SizeAndTimeBasedRollingPolicy æ¯” TimeBasedRollingPolicy å¤šäº†ä¸€ä¸ªæ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶å¤§å°è®¾å®šçš„å±æ€§ï¼šmaxFileSizeï¼Œå…¶ä»–å®Œå…¨ä¸€æ ·ã€‚

                            åŸºäºæˆ‘ä»¬å¯¹ RollingPolicy çš„äº†è§£ï¼Œå¯ä»¥æŠŠ logback-test.xml çš„å†…å®¹è°ƒæ•´ä¸ºä»¥ä¸‹å†…å®¹ï¼š

                            <configuration>
    <appender name="stdout" class="ch.qos.logback.core.ConsoleAppender">
        <Target>System.out</Target>
        <encoder>
            <pattern>%d{HH:mm:ss.SSS} [%thread] %level %logger{36} - %msg%n</pattern>
        </encoder>
    </appender>
<appender name="D" class="ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender">
    <Append>true</Append>
    <File>debug.log</File>
    <rollingPolicy class="ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.TimeBasedRollingPolicy">
        <!--            æŒ‰å¤©è½®è½¬ -->
        <fileNamePattern>debug.%d{yyyy-MM-dd}.log</fileNamePattern>
        <!--            ä¿å­˜ 30 å¤©çš„å†å²è®°å½•ï¼Œæœ€å¤§å¤§å°ä¸º 30GB -->
        <maxHistory>30</maxHistory>
        <totalSizeCap>3GB</totalSizeCap>
    </rollingPolicy>
    <encoder>
        <pattern>%relative [%thread] %-5level %logger{35} - %msg%n</pattern>
    </encoder>
</appender>
    <appender name="E" class="ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender">
        <File>error.log</File>
        <rollingPolicy class="ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.TimeBasedRollingPolicy">
            <!--            æŒ‰å¤©è½®è½¬ -->
            <fileNamePattern>error.%d{yyyy-MM-dd}.log</fileNamePattern>
            <!--            ä¿å­˜ 30 å¤©çš„å†å²è®°å½•ï¼Œæœ€å¤§å¤§å°ä¸º 30GB -->
            <maxHistory>30</maxHistory>
            <totalSizeCap>3GB</totalSizeCap>
        </rollingPolicy>
        <encoder>
            <pattern>%d{yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss} [ %t:%r ] - [ %p ] %m%n</pattern>
        </encoder>
        <filter class="ch.qos.logback.classic.filter.ThresholdFilter">
            <level>ERROR</level>
        </filter>
    </appender>
    <root level="debug">
        <appender-ref ref="stdout"/>
        <appender-ref ref="D"/>
        <appender-ref ref="E"/>
    </root>
</configuration>

                            ä¿®æ”¹ Test ç±»çš„å†…å®¹ï¼š

                            public class Test {
    static Logger logger = LoggerFactory.getLogger(Test.class);
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        logger.debug("logback");
        logger.error("logback");
    }
}
